summary: The diff adds an SEO utility and updates the existing AuthorGuidelinesPage to set document title/meta description and render guideline content with semantic headings and lists. However, at least one acceptance detail (curly quotes) is not met based on the shown content, and the full ordered list items 13–20 cannot be verified due to truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the introductory paragraphs and the 3 bullet points exactly as provided, preserving punctuation and curly quotes (e.g., “Popular Articles”).
missing_requirements.reason: The page content shown uses straight quotes around "Popular Articles" and "Technical Articles" rather than curly quotes, which violates the requirement to preserve curly quotes verbatim.

missing_requirements.requirement: The "Formatting Guidelines" section is an H2 followed by a single ordered list containing items 13–20 exactly as provided.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff output is truncated mid-way through the Formatting Guidelines list (after item 17/18 begins), so items 13–20 being present and exact cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.
